tool_description: Detect language of the input text
name: DETECT LANGUAGE By DaddyApi
title: DETECT LANGUAGE By DaddyApi

api_list.name: Detect
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://detect-language-by-daddyapi.p.rapidapi.com/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "detect-language-by-daddyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
